<data-table [items]="arrayRoleUser"
            [itemCount]="arrayRoleUser.length"
            [sortAsc]="true"
            [limit]="9999"
            [header]="false"
            [selectColumn]="false"
            [multiSelect]="false"
            (reload)="loadAccessRole()"
            [expandableRows]="false"
            [pagination]="false"
            [pagination_input]="true"
            [pagination_range]="true"
            [indexColumnHeader]="'#'"
            [indexColumn]="true"
            [selectOnRowClick]="true"
            [showReloading]="false">
  <data-table-column

      [header]="'COMMON.MODULE.USER_PROFILE.GROUP_NAME' | translate"
      [width]="200">
  </data-table-column>
  <data-table-column
      [property]="'description'"

</data-table>
